offerings.title: Prototyping
description: - Wireframing: Creating mockups and layouts to visualize business needs and project goals.
- High-Fidelity Prototyping: Crafting detailed prototypes with real data for a complete user experience.
- Consulting & Strategy: Offering expert guidance on UI/UX best practices to ensure a user-friendly design.
- User Testing & Feedback: Gathering insights from user tests to optimize the prototype before development.

offerings.title: System Design
description: - Scalable Architecture: Designing robust, scalable systems tailored to handle large-scale applications.
- Data Modeling: Structuring databases and data flows to ensure efficiency and scalability.
- API Design & Integration: Developing APIs for seamless communication between frontend, backend, and third-party services.
- Cloud Infrastructure: Implementing cloud-based solutions for scalability, performance, and security.

offerings.title: DevOps
description: - CI/CD Pipelines: Automating deployment and testing to ensure continuous integration and delivery.
- Containerization: Using Docker to streamline deployments and manage microservices.
- Cloud Deployment: Deploying applications on cloud platforms such as AWS and Azure for high availability.
- Monitoring & Maintenance: Setting up monitoring tools such as Sentry and Grafana to ensure uptime and performance, with ongoing support.

offerings.title: Development
description: - Frontend Development: Building responsive, user-friendly interfaces using React, Next.js, and modern web technologies.
- Fullstack Development: Developing complete solutions from frontend to backend using MERN stack and TypeScript.
- API Development: Creating and integrating RESTful APIs to connect various systems and services.
- Database Management: Designing and managing databases with a focus on security, scalability, and performance.
